Kirstin works with complex data to create practical solutions for technical and non-technical teams. She has experience in business, IT, and healthcare environments, building tools in Tableau, Power BI, Google Looker Studio and R that are maintainable and scalable.

Kirstin manages data projects and mentors team members through training sessions. She has worked in resource-constrained settings and focuses on creating solutions that fit organisational requirements.
